title: Morty and the Oatmeal Babysitter
subtle: Fantasy (fiction), 1,480 words, Level Q (Grade 3), Lexile 650L, Fiction Series
description: Morty and the Oatmeal Babysitter is the story of Morty, a mischievous mouse, who wants to go with his friends to see the circus. However, Morty's mother has asked him to stay at home and watch his siblings until she returns. Faced with the dilemma of what he wants to do and what he should do, Morty learns an important lesson. Illustrations support the text.
